name: access-control
label: Access Control
description: Complete access control system with RBAC, ABAC, permissions, policies, audit, and fine-grained security - roles, permissions, policies, delegation, and data-level security

name: user-management
label: User Management
description: User authentication and identity management - users, sessions, 2FA, password policies, notifications, and OAuth integration

name: support-types
label: Support Types
description: Supporting data types and utilities - addresses, measurements, values

name: reference-data
label: Reference Data
description: Standardized reference data - countries, languages, currencies, genders, etc.

name: core-entities
label: Core Business Entities
description: Fundamental business entities - people and organizations

name: transverse
label: Transverse Entities
description: Universal entities that apply across all domains - audit trails, external references, consents, and cross-cutting concerns

name: crm
label: Customer Management
description: Customer Relationship Management - customer data, segmentation, loyalty programs, marketing consents, and relationship tracking

name: e-commerce
label: E-Commerce
description: Online retail, product catalogs, shopping carts, orders, and customer management

name: financial
label: Financial
description: Accounting, invoicing, payments, and financial transactions

name: tax
label: Tax & Compliance
description: Tax configuration, calculation rules, jurisdictions, and compliance across all countries and tax systems (VAT, GST, sales tax, withholding, social security, etc.)

name: human-resources
label: Human Resources
description: Employee management, recruitment, attendance, performance, training, and payroll

name: patient-management
label: Patient Management
description: Patient demographics, contacts, identity verification, and patient relationship management

name: clinical-care
label: Clinical Care
description: Care plans, clinical encounters, observations, procedures, and diagnosis

name: medical-providers
label: Medical Providers
description: Healthcare practitioners and facilities providing medical services

name: pharmacy
label: Pharmacy
description: Medication management and prescription tracking

name: medical-records
label: Medical Records
description: Electronic health records, allergies, immunizations, and lab test results

name: nursing-care
label: Nursing & Care Services
description: Daily care activities, ADL assessments, nursing interventions, and care team observations

name: healthcare-admin
label: Healthcare Administration
description: Appointment scheduling, insurance, and healthcare administrative functions

name: fleet
label: Fleet Management
description: Vehicle tracking, maintenance, fuel management, and service scheduling

name: knowledge
label: Knowledge Management
description: Document management, knowledge bases, categories, and search functionality
